forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 18C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 63F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 18C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain developing after midnight. Low 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 16C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 60F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 61F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 16C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening, then clear overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening, then clear overnight. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 61F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening with some clearing overnight. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
